casebody.data:
GERARD LEVIS, ET AL., PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. GEORGE ZAPOLITZ, ET AL., DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS. Messrs. Roslcein, Kronisch, Felzenberg & Mandell for the petitioners. Mr. Michael Howard, Mr. William Osterweil and Mr. Sidney D. Weiss for the respondent. May 14, 1962.

See same case below: 72 N. J. Super. 168.
